page.title: 07TWEEDBANK INDUSTRIAL ESTATE
page.content: The{Industrial Estate}is situated in {Tweedbank.}It consists of factories of Magnet and Southerns,a brewery storehouse,Sprague Electric,John Dun and Co,Duromedics,Border Electronic, Dynamit Nobel,Eildon Electronics, Surgical Engineering and 3 of the factories were empty.Magnet Southerns is a warehouse that sells windows and doors.They have factories that make the goods for Magnet Southerns only.Magnet Southerns ship their goods overseas but they sell more in Britain. Eildon Electronics make calculators which can tell you how much you earn;if you have to work harder;or a machine which can tell the time.They send a man overseas every month to try and sell their goods.Hill Robinson make thread and dental floss. They don't have overseas workers.
